pignlproc.markup

Class AnnotatingMarkupParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • pignlproc.markup.AnnotatingMarkupParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    info.bliki.wiki.filter.ITextConverter

    public class AnnotatingMarkupParser
extends Object
implements info.bliki.wiki.filter.ITextConverter
    Parse mediawiki markup to strip the formatting info and extract a simple text version suitable for NLP along with header, paragraph and link position annotations. Use the #convert(String) and #getWikiLinks() methods. Due to the constraints imposed by the ITextConverter / WikiModel API, this class is not thread safe: only one instance should be run by thread.

        public String parse(String rawWikiMarkup)
        Convert WikiMarkup to a simple text representation suitable for NLP analysis. The links encountered during the extraction are then available by calling #getWikiLinks().
        Parameters:
        rawWikiMarkup -
        Returns:
        the simple text without the markup
